tidbits.title: Voodoo Practices
tidbits.description: Togo has a significant presence of Voodoo practices, deeply rooted in its culture and traditions, influencing ceremonies, rituals, and everyday life.

tidbits.title: Market Culture
tidbits.description: The country's bustling markets, like the Grand Marché in Lomé, showcase vibrant colors, diverse goods, and a lively atmosphere, reflecting local commerce and culture.

tidbits.title: Colonial History
tidbits.description: Togo has a history shaped by colonial influences from various European powers, contributing to its diverse heritage and blending of traditions.
